Eirenopolis: = the citie of peace Surueyed and commended to all Christians. By Tho. Adams. Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.
[6], 184 p.
Printed by Aug. Matthewes for Iohn Grismand, and are to bee sold at his shop in Pauls Alley at the signe of the Gunne, London : 1622.
Running title reads: The citie of peace. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
